ygData.subject: RE: Need info again
ygData.msgSnippet: Since u and me are both cursed,  I think we can try to camp again together to get the cursed + cursed = blessed thing.... ;)  Anyway, I am planning to do it
ygData.messageBody:
Since u and me are both cursed, I think we can try to camp again together to get the
cursed + cursed = blessed thing.... ;) Anyway, I am planning to do it AGAIN for this
Thursday since I'm off work on Friday. Hah... Interested? Oh... for the spawn time,
someone said 3am to
6am is the highest drop time. Yipe... last time when I was camped with Cairn, he got
his at 630 right after I left........ so?? WHY THE EQ GOD HATES ME SO MUCH!

On Wed, 22 Sep 1999 10:58:53 +0800, LKW wrote:

>From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>
>Kow, 200HP, 1 nuke can settle liao, hehe.
>
>I tried to camp Jboot few times, the longest is 11 hrs (no drop in 11hrs at
>all, I #1 in the Q) amd 13 hrs (drop 3 in 1st 5 hrs and nothing in the next
>8 hrs when I become #1 in Q). Dunno I'm cursed or wat ;( Any tips what
>time jboot will spawn at S'pore time (I heard pple say some items only drop
>at specific time)? As for anti-camp, GM ever show up in Derz room saying
>there IS anti-camp code in room, but I myself see someone got jboot liao,
>stay behind help their friend to get jboot - 2 jboots still spawn even they
>just stand at Derz's throne. ;(
>
>As for runed circlet, I waiting for flat chest and FF to go along with me.
> They both 34 now, shld lvl very soon ;) *hint hint*. I ever see a warrior
>solo camp for circlet but I quite scare of triggering train in that room.
> Once I oom and kena crowd of goblins whacking me, I'm as good as dead
>meat.
>
>Ziltus.
>
>On Wednesday, 22 September, 1999 10:29 AM, Lim choong Ee
>[SMTP:choongee@...] wrote:
>> From: Lim choong Ee <choongee@...>
>>
>> ancient croc is definately less then 200 hp so no worry on soloing
>> only problem is he hit hard in the 50dmg.
>> if the place holder spawn which is a smaller version of croc
>> u had to kill them, they r much easier, u can pull them
>> to the water edge without any trouble from the other at all
>> at 35, it's a very easy place to hold unless the ancient croc
>> cast the DD spell on u call PL.
>> and one thing, at 35 n u still had no jboot :p
>> u better go camp the boot first before u do anything esle.
>> u r still wearing servant cap.....get2 more your level go to
>> camp the preacher n get the ruin circlet, it's pretty easy to camp
>> if u had 2 more buddy your level.
>>
>>
>>
>> At 09:31 AM 9/22/99 +0800, you wrote:
>> >From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>> >
>> >Hmm...what is the lvl of the 3 croc that I must kill b4 ancient croc
>spawn?
>> > Will all 3 pulled to me when I attacked one (me lvl 35 still, after
>kena
>> >killed by lag yesterday night, FRESH lvl 35, hehe)? Other than ancient
>> >croc, is there any goodies dropped in lower guk (beside shimmering orb,
>> >undead protection collar, woven glass bracer, midnight mallet)? Lastly,
>> >what's the HP of ancient croc? Thx.
>> >
>> >Ziltus
>> >
>> >On Tuesday, 21 September, 1999 3:07 PM, Diablo
>> >[SMTP:diablo99@...] wrote:
>> >> From: "Diablo" <diablo99@...>
>> >>
>> >> 1. Gatorscale sleeves on Ancient Crocodile level 30 1/4 chance of
>> >dropping
>> >> it
>> >> 2. Lizardscale Cloak on Tae Ew Templar, CT level 30 (?) Less than
>1110hp.
>> >> Almost sure chance of dropping it, unless you get the rubicite greaves
>> >from
>> >> it =)
>> >> 3. Gatorscale Leggings on the same Ancient Crocodile 3/4 chance of
>> >dropping
>> >> it
>> >>
>> >> Tae Ew Templar is 20 min spawn, but usually there is something else as
>> >> placeholder.
>> >> Ancient Crocodile is 2hr-6hr spawn, but you have to clear the 3
>> >crocodiles
>> >> there to make it spawn
>> >>
>> >> P.s Prexus server has killed Lord Nagafen. )
>> >>
>> >> Mazy
>> >> Level 49 Wizard
>> >> Prexus
